doc.title: Check Into Ogenki Clinic
doc.plot: As pornography and sexual services become everyday sights in Tokyo, many people have started developing neuroses as a result of stimulation overload. To help these poor souls, Dr. Ogenki, with the help of his nurse, Miss Katase, has opened a clinic specially designed to enable the impotent, frigid or otherwise frustrated to return to normal, frequent and satisfying sexual activity.
